description: cotton patchwork panel in shades of blues and browns; washy, faded gray-green patch at lower L edge, with a pattern of a box, and three linear circular elements; blue patches with white tie-dyed geometric shapes in C right

title: Patchwork (boro) bedding cover (futonji)
